title: Revball
description:
Revball is an exciting new paddle ball game for the OUYA!  Part pinball, part ping-pong, but completely unique, Revball is a fast paced game of skill. It's Blue versus Green in a single or multi-player competition.

The object is to strategically hit the ball with your paddle to keep it from escaping the circular arena. Miss the ball, and your opponent gets a point.  Grab the powerups when they appear to fire at your opponent, but move fast or you'll miss your turn to hit the ball!

Features:
- Simple to learn, but hard to master.
- One player against the computer, or two players with a friend.
- Try to beat the computer on all 20 tables in the single player campaign.
- Choose the table for your competition, or select random, and the table changes after every point.
- Use powerups to fire at your opponent and shrink or freeze their paddle.
- Use the different styles of bumpers to send the ball where your opponent least expects.
- Lots of multi-player fun!
overview: Released in October 2014 by Nickel Buddy, LLC.
